name: Jet Jumper
description:
Lure the slimes to their own death by baiting them and jumping at the last minute. 

Try to clear the level by killing all the slimes, watch out though because every jump you take will destroy part of the level.

Arrow keys to move, pause menu in the top right corner. ESC to show the reset/console menu.

Music: AN ARPEGGIO SONG by StinkerB06 - https://tic.computer/play?cart=746

Only 1 level at the moment I may make more if this gains any traction.
